name: Save Nature: Wildfire! Edition
description:
Turn the land completely green by sending clouds to put the fire out!

Fire spreads across the land, burning the vegetation until only ash remains. Create clouds and blow them over the land to stop fires and restore the greenery.

You win if you can turn all the land tiles green! You lose if all the land tiles turn grey.

Controls: Mouse
  • Click and hold on a empty green or yellow tile to create a cloud
  • Creating your first cloud will start the game
  • Click and swipe a cloud to move it to an adjacent tile
  • Careful! You can also click and swipe fires to spread them
Goal
  • Move clouds over fires to put them all out
  • Move clouds over yellow and grey tiles to turn them all green
Game: Clouds!
  • Clouds over fires will put them out over time
  • Clouds over grey or yellow tiles will turn them green over time
  • Clouds will eventually shrink and disappear
  • Water is required to make clouds! Green tiles produce water
Game: Fire!
  • Small fires will grow and then set adjacent tiles on fire
  • Fires over yellow tiles will turn them grey over time
Credits

This game was made for the Spring into Summer Sok Jam 2022 to be made in the style of Sokpop. We were given a whole month to do it and I procrastinated until the deadline and then made this in 12 hours. Now I sleep.

The theme was "Save Nature/Protect the Planet!" Many wildfires are human caused. Please be safe in the coming season! 

Solo game dev/art: mango
